documentation.text:
@title VaultZorro. The Vault for staking the Zorro token
 @dev Only to be deployed on the home of the ZOR token
@notice Public function for farming Want token.

@title VaultZorro. The Vault for staking the Zorro token
 @dev Only to be deployed on the home of the ZOR token
@notice Public function for farming Want token.

devdoc.details: Only to be deployed on the home of the ZOR token

constructor.details: NOTE: Only to be deployed on home chain!

params._USDCToToken0Path: Router path to swap from USDC to ZORRO
params._addresses: : [gov, Zorro controller, Zorro token, Uni v2 router address]
params._pid: : The pool ID in the Zorro Controller
params._token0ToUSDCPath: Router path to swap from Zorro to USDC

params._wantAmt: amount of Want token to deposit/stake

params._maxMarketMovementAllowed: The max slippage allowed. (included here just to implement interface; otherwise unused)
params._priceData: A PriceData struct containing the latest prices for relevant tokens
A PriceData struct containing the latest prices for relevant tokens

params._amount: The Want token quantity to exchange
params._maxMarketMovementAllowed: The max slippage allowed for swaps. (included here just to implement interface; otherwise unused)
params._priceData: A PriceData struct containing the latest prices for relevant tokens

params._amount: The amount of the tokens to transfer
params._to: The address to transfer tokens to
params._token: Address of the ERC20 token to transfer

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._entranceFeeFactor: Entrance fee numerator (higher means smaller percentage)
params._withdrawFeeFactor: Withdrawal fee numerator (higher means smaller percentage)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._harvestOnly: unused for this function (only here to comply with interface)

devdoc.title: VaultZorro. The Vault for staking the Zorro token

earn(uint256,(uint256,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: The main compounding (earn) function. Reinvests profits since the last earn event.

exchangeUSDForWantToken(uint256,uint256,.notice: Performs necessary operations to convert USDC into Want token

exchangeWantTokenForUSD(uint256,uint256,.notice: Converts Want token back into USD to be ready for withdrawal

farm().notice: Public function for farming Want token.

inCaseTokensGetStuck(address,uint256,add.notice: Safely transfer ERC20 tokens stuck in this contract to a specified address

withdrawWantToken(address,bool).notice: Withdraw Want tokens from the Farm contract
